Matrices Part I

V= {[0.000.050.060.300.00],[0.000.020.020.400.00],[0.000.340.054.700.00],2[0.000.020.250.400.00]}=[0.000.450.636.200.00]\{ \begin{bmatrix} 0.00 \\ 0.05 \\ 0.06 \\ 0.30 \\ 0.00 \end{bmatrix}, \begin{bmatrix} 0.00 \\ 0.02 \\ 0.02 \\ 0.40 \\ 0.00 \end{bmatrix}, \begin{bmatrix} 0.00 \\ 0.34 \\ 0.05 \\ 4.70 \\ 0.00 \end{bmatrix},2\begin{bmatrix} 0.00 \\ 0.02 \\ 0.25 \\ 0.40 \\ 0.00 \end{bmatrix}\}= \begin{bmatrix} 0.00 \\ 0.45 \\ 0.63 \\ 6.20 \\ 0.00 \end{bmatrix}{​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​0.00​0.05​0.06​0.30​0.00​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​,​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​0.00​0.02​0.02​0.40​0.00​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​,​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​0.00​0.34​0.05​4.70​0.00​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​,2​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​0.00​0.02​0.25​0.40​0.00​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​}=​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​0.00​0.45​0.63​6.20​0.00​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​

New Problem: what are the coefficients?
x1v1⃗+x2v2⃗+x3v3⃗+x4v4⃗=b⃗\qquad x_1\vec{v_1}+x_2\vec{v_2}+x_3\vec{v_3}+x_4\vec{v_4} = \vec{b}x​1​​​v​1​​​⃗​​+x​2​​​v​2​​​⃗​​+x​3​​​v​3​​​⃗​​+x​4​​​v​4​​​⃗​​=​b​⃗​​
x⃗=?\qquad\vec{x}=?​x​⃗​​=?

Def| Matrix

A matrix A_{m×\times×n} over a field F\mathbb{F}F, is a two-dimensional array with m-rows, n columns

[a11⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅a1n⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅am1⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅amn],\begin{bmatrix} a_{11} \cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot a_{1n} \\ \cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot \\ \cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot \\ \cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot \\ a_{m1} \cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot a_{mn} \end{bmatrix},​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​a​11​​⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅a​1n​​​⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅​⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅​⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅​a​m1​​⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅a​mn​​​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​, where aij∈Fa_{ij}\in \mathbb{F}a​ij​​∈F

Other notations:
∙\bullet∙ A = [aij] m×naij∈F[a_{ij}]\space_{m\times n} \qquad a_{ij}\in \mathbb{F}[a​ij​​] ​m×n​​a​ij​​∈F
∙\bullet∙ A = [−−a1⃗−−...−−am⃗−−],\begin{bmatrix} -- \vec{a_1}-- \\ .\\ .\\ .\\ -- \vec{a_m}-- \end{bmatrix},​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​−−​a​1​​​⃗​​−−​.​.​.​−−​a​m​​​⃗​​−−​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​, where ai∈Fna_i\in\mathbb{F^n}a​i​​∈F​n​​

∙\bullet∙ A = [∣∣a1⃗⋅⋅⋅an⃗∣∣],\begin{bmatrix} | \\ |\\ \vec{a_1}\cdot\cdot\cdot\vec{a_n}\\ |\\ |\\ \end{bmatrix},​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​∣​∣​​a​1​​​⃗​​⋅⋅⋅​a​n​​​⃗​​​∣​∣​​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​, where aj∈Fma_j\in\mathbb{F^m}a​j​​∈F​m​​

Def | column / row space

Let A∈Fm×nA\in \mathbb{F_{m\times n}}A∈F​m×n​​

∙\bullet∙ The row space of A is the set of vectors

Row(A) = {ai⃗\vec{a_i}​a​i​​​⃗​​ | where ai⃗\vec{a_i}​a​i​​​⃗​​ is a row of A ai⃗∈Fn\vec{a_i}\in \mathbb{F^n}​a​i​​​⃗​​∈F​n​​}

∙\bullet∙ The column space of A is the set of vectors

Col(A) = {aj⃗\vec{a_j}​a​j​​​⃗​​ | where aj⃗\vec{a_j}​a​j​​​⃗​​ are column of A aj⃗∈Fm\vec{a_j}\in \mathbb{F^m}​a​j​​​⃗​​∈F​m​​}

Example 1 | What are the row and column spaces of

A= [123456]\begin{bmatrix} 1\quad 2\quad 3 \\ 4\quad 5\quad 6 \end{bmatrix}[​123​456​​]

Row(A) = {[1,2,3],[4,5,6]}
Col(A) = {[1,4],[2,5],[3,6]}

Def | Transpose

Let A ∈Fm×n\in F_{m\times n}∈F​m×n​​. The transpose of A, AT∈Fn×mA^T\in \mathbb{F_{n\times m}}A​T​​∈F​n×m​​ is the matrix

AT=[∣∣a1⃗⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅am⃗∣∣]A^T = \begin{bmatrix} |\qquad\qquad| \\ \vec{a_1}\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\cdot\vec{a_m}\\ |\qquad\qquad| \end{bmatrix}A​T​​=​⎣​⎡​​​∣∣​​a​1​​​⃗​​⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅​a​m​​​⃗​​​∣∣​​​⎦​⎤​​

A = [−−a1⃗−−...−−am⃗−−]\begin{bmatrix} -- \vec{a_1} -- \\ \quad .\\ \quad .\\ \quad .\\ -- \vec{a_m} -- \end{bmatrix}​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​−−​a​1​​​⃗​​−−​.​.​.​−−​a​m​​​⃗​​−−​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​

Exampe 2

A=A=A= [123456]2×3\begin{bmatrix} 1\quad 2\quad 3 \\ 4\quad 5\quad 6 \end{bmatrix}_{2\times 3}[​123​456​​]​2×3​​

AT=A^T=A​T​​= [142536]3×2\begin{bmatrix} 1\quad 4 \\ 2\quad 5 \\ 3\quad 6 \end{bmatrix}_{3\times 2}​⎣​⎡​​​14​25​36​​​⎦​⎤​​​3×2​​

b.)
A=[1221]A= \begin{bmatrix} 1\quad 2 \\ 2\quad 1 \end{bmatrix}A=[​12​21​​]

AT=[1221]A^T= \begin{bmatrix} 1\quad 2 \\ 2\quad 1 \end{bmatrix}A​T​​=[​12​21​​]

Def | Symmetric

A matrix A∈Fn×nA\in\mathbb{F}_{n\times n}A∈F​n×n​​ is Symmetric if A=ATA = A^TA=A​T​​

Note: Only square matrices (i.e. m=n) can be Symmetric

Addition

Let A,B∈Fm×nA,B \in \mathbb{F}_{m\times n}A,B∈F​m×n​​
then
A+B=[cij] m×nA+B = [c_{ij}]\space_{m\times n}A+B=[c​ij​​] ​m×n​​ where cij=aij+bijc_{ij} = a_{ij}+b_{ij}c​ij​​=a​ij​​+b​ij​​

E.g.[2112]+[1234]=[2+11+21+32+4]=[3346]E.g. \begin{bmatrix} 2\quad 1\\ 1\quad 2 \end{bmatrix}+ \begin{bmatrix} 1\quad 2\\ 3\quad 4 \end{bmatrix}= \begin{bmatrix} 2+1\quad 1+2\\ 1+3\quad 2+4 \end{bmatrix}= \begin{bmatrix} 3\quad 3\\ 4\quad 6 \end{bmatrix}E.g.[​21​12​​]+[​12​34​​]=[​2+11+2​1+32+4​​]=[​33​46​​]

Def | Scalar Mult

let A∈Fm×n,α∈FA\in\mathbb{F_{m\times n}}, \alpha\in\mathbb{F}A∈F​m×n​​,α∈F
αA=[αaij]m×n\alpha A = \begin{bmatrix} \alpha a_{ij} \end{bmatrix}_{m\times n}αA=[​αa​ij​​​​]​m×n​​

3[1001]=[3003]3\begin{bmatrix} 1\quad 0 \\ 0\quad 1 \end{bmatrix}= \begin{bmatrix} 3\quad 0\\ 0\quad 3 \end{bmatrix}3[​10​01​​]=[​30​03​​]

Def | Matrix-Matrix Mult:

let A∈Fm×pA\in\mathbb{F_{m\times p}}A∈F​m×p​​ and B∈Fp×nB\in \mathbb{F_{p\times n}}B∈F​p×n​​

A⋅B=[a11⋅⋅⋅a1p⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅am1⋅⋅⋅amp]⋅[b11⋅⋅⋅b1n⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅bp1⋅⋅⋅bpn]=[∑k=1pa1kbk1⋅⋅⋅∑k=1pa1kbkp⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅⋅∑k=1pamkbk1⋅⋅⋅∑k=1pamkbkn]m×nA\cdot B =\begin{bmatrix} a_{11}\cdot\cdot\cdot a_{1p} \\ \cdot\qquad \cdot \\ \cdot\qquad \cdot \\ \cdot\qquad \cdot \\ a_{m1}\cdot\cdot\cdot a_{mp} \end{bmatrix}\cdot \begin{bmatrix} b_{11}\cdot\cdot\cdot b_{1n} \\ \cdot\qquad \cdot \\ \cdot\qquad \cdot \\ \cdot\qquad \cdot \\ b_{p1}\cdot\cdot\cdot b_{pn} \end{bmatrix}= \begin{bmatrix} \sum_{k=1}^{p}a_{1k}b_{k1}\cdot\cdot\cdot \sum_{k=1}^{p}a_{1k}b_{kp} \\ \cdot\qquad \cdot \\ \cdot\qquad \cdot \\ \cdot\qquad \cdot \\ \sum_{k=1}^{p}a_{mk}b_{k1}\cdot\cdot\cdot \sum_{k=1}^{p}a_{mk}b_{kn} \end{bmatrix}_{m\times n}A⋅B=​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​a​11​​⋅⋅⋅a​1p​​​⋅⋅​⋅⋅​⋅⋅​a​m1​​⋅⋅⋅a​mp​​​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​⋅​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​b​11​​⋅⋅⋅b​1n​​​⋅⋅​⋅⋅​⋅⋅​b​p1​​⋅⋅⋅b​pn​​​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​=​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​∑​k=1​p​​a​1k​​b​k1​​⋅⋅⋅∑​k=1​p​​a​1k​​b​kp​​​⋅⋅​⋅⋅​⋅⋅​∑​k=1​p​​a​mk​​b​k1​​⋅⋅⋅∑​k=1​p​​a​mk​​b​kn​​​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​​m×n​​

Example 3

A=[123456]2×3A = \begin{bmatrix} 1\quad 2\quad 3 \\ 4\quad 5\quad 6 \end{bmatrix}_{2\times 3}A=[​123​456​​]​2×3​​

B=[100100]3×2B = \begin{bmatrix} 1\quad 0 \\ 0\quad 1 \\ 0\quad 0 \end{bmatrix}_{3\times 2}B=​⎣​⎡​​​10​01​00​​​⎦​⎤​​​3×2​​

C=[200020002]3×3C = \begin{bmatrix} 2\quad 0\quad 0 \\ 0\quad 2\quad 0 \\ 0\quad 0\quad 2 \end{bmatrix}_{3\times 3}C=​⎣​⎡​​​200​020​002​​​⎦​⎤​​​3×3​​

a.)A⋅B=A\cdot B=A⋅B= [1(1)+2(0)+3(0)1(0)+2(1)+3(0)4(1)+5(0)+6(0)4(0)+5(1)+6(0)]\begin{bmatrix} 1(1)+2(0)+3(0)\quad 1(0)+2(1)+3(0) \\ 4(1)+5(0)+6(0)\quad 4(0)+5(1)+6(0) \end{bmatrix}[​1(1)+2(0)+3(0)1(0)+2(1)+3(0)​4(1)+5(0)+6(0)4(0)+5(1)+6(0)​​]
=[1245]2×2\begin{bmatrix} 1\quad 2\\ 4\quad 5 \end{bmatrix}_{2\times 2}[​12​45​​]​2×2​​

b.) A⋅C=A\cdot C=A⋅C= [1(2)+2(0)+3(0)1(0)+2(2)+3(0)64(2)+5(0)+6(0)4(0)+5(2)+6(0)12]\begin{bmatrix} 1(2)+2(0)+3(0)\quad 1(0)+2(2)+3(0)\quad 6 \\ 4(2)+5(0)+6(0)\quad 4(0)+5(2)+6(0)\quad 12 \end{bmatrix}[​1(2)+2(0)+3(0)1(0)+2(2)+3(0)6​4(2)+5(0)+6(0)4(0)+5(2)+6(0)12​​]
=[24681012]2×3=\begin{bmatrix} 2\quad 4\quad 6 \\ 8\quad 10\quad 12 \end{bmatrix}_{2\times 3}=[​246​81012​​]​2×3​​

Notice
A⋅C=[2[14]+1[25]+0[36]3[14]+2[25]+0[36]4[14]+0[25]+2[36]]A\cdot C = \begin{bmatrix} 2\begin{bmatrix}1\\ 4\end{bmatrix}+1\begin{bmatrix}2\\ 5\end{bmatrix}+0\begin{bmatrix}3\\ 6\end{bmatrix} \qquad 3\begin{bmatrix}1\\ 4\end{bmatrix}+2\begin{bmatrix}2\\ 5\end{bmatrix}+0\begin{bmatrix}3\\ 6\end{bmatrix} \qquad 4\begin{bmatrix}1\\ 4\end{bmatrix}+0\begin{bmatrix}2\\ 5\end{bmatrix}+2\begin{bmatrix}3\\ 6\end{bmatrix} \end{bmatrix}A⋅C=[​2[​1​4​​]+1[​2​5​​]+0[​3​6​​]3[​1​4​​]+2[​2​5​​]+0[​3​6​​]4[​1​4​​]+0[​2​5​​]+2[​3​6​​]​​]

Am×p⋅Cp×n=[∣ ∣ ∣a1⃗a2⃗a1⃗∣ ∣ ∣][c11⋅⋅⋅c1nc21.cp1⋅⋅⋅cpn]=[c11a11+c21a21+cp1ap1⋅⋅⋅...c1na11+c2na21+cpnap1⋅⋅⋅]A_{m\times p} \cdot C_{p\times n} = \begin{bmatrix} |\quad\space | \quad\space | \\ \vec{a_1}\quad \vec{a_2}\quad \vec{a_1} \\ |\quad\space | \quad\space | \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} c_{11}\cdot\cdot\cdot c_{1n}\\ c_{21}\qquad\quad \\ .\qquad\quad\\ c_{p1}\cdot\cdot\cdot c_{pn} \end{bmatrix}= \begin{bmatrix} c_{11}a_{11}+c_{21}a_{21}+c_{p1}a_{p1}\cdot\cdot\cdot \\ .\\ .\\ .\\ c_{1n}a_{11}+c_{2n}a_{21}+c_{pn}a_{p1}\cdot\cdot\cdot \end{bmatrix}A​m×p​​⋅C​p×n​​=​⎣​⎡​​​∣ ∣ ∣​​a​1​​​⃗​​​a​2​​​⃗​​​a​1​​​⃗​​​∣ ∣ ∣​​​⎦​⎤​​​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​c​11​​⋅⋅⋅c​1n​​​c​21​​​.​c​p1​​⋅⋅⋅c​pn​​​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎤​​=​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​c​11​​a​11​​+c​21​​a​21​​+c​p1​​a​p1​​⋅⋅⋅​.​.​.​c​1n​​a​11​​+c​2n​​a​21​​+c​pn​​a​p1​​⋅⋅⋅​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​

=[∣∣∣∑k=1pck1a1⃗∑k=1pck1a1⃗∑k=1pck1a1⃗∣∣∣]=\begin{bmatrix} |\qquad\qquad | \qquad\qquad | \\ \sum_{k=1}^{p} c_{k1}\vec{a_1} \qquad \sum_{k=1}^{p} c_{k1}\vec{a_1} \qquad \sum_{k=1}^{p} c_{k1}\vec{a_1} \\ |\qquad\qquad | \qquad\qquad | \end{bmatrix}=​⎣​⎡​​​∣∣∣​∑​k=1​p​​c​k1​​​a​1​​​⃗​​∑​k=1​p​​c​k1​​​a​1​​​⃗​​∑​k=1​p​​c​k1​​​a​1​​​⃗​​​∣∣∣​​​⎦​⎤​​

A⋅C=[−−a1⃗−−...−−am⃗−−][∣∣b1⃗⋅⋅⋅bn⃗∣∣]A\cdot C = \begin{bmatrix} -- \vec{a_1} -- \\ .\\ .\\ .\\ -- \vec{a_m} -- \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} |\qquad\quad |\\ \vec{b_1}\cdot\cdot\cdot \vec{b_n}\\ |\qquad\quad | \end{bmatrix}A⋅C=​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​−−​a​1​​​⃗​​−−​.​.​.​−−​a​m​​​⃗​​−−​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​​⎣​⎡​​​∣∣​​b​1​​​⃗​​⋅⋅⋅​b​n​​​⃗​​​∣∣​​​⎦​⎤​​

=[a1⃗b1⃗⋅⋅⋅a1⃗bn⃗a2⃗b1⃗⋅⋅⋅..am⃗b1⃗⋅⋅⋅am⃗bn⃗]=\begin{bmatrix} \vec{a_1}\vec{b_1} \cdot\cdot\cdot \vec{a_1}\vec{b_n}\\ \vec{a_2}\vec{b_1} \cdot\cdot\cdot\qquad\\ .\\ .\\ \vec{a_m}\vec{b_1} \cdot\cdot\cdot \vec{a_m}\vec{b_n} \end{bmatrix}=​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​​a​1​​​⃗​​​b​1​​​⃗​​⋅⋅⋅​a​1​​​⃗​​​b​n​​​⃗​​​​a​2​​​⃗​​​b​1​​​⃗​​⋅⋅⋅​.​.​​a​m​​​⃗​​​b​1​​​⃗​​⋅⋅⋅​a​m​​​⃗​​​b​n​​​⃗​​​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​

Matrix - Vector

Let A∈Fm×nA\in \mathbb{F_{m\times n}}A∈F​m×n​​ and v⃗∈Fn\vec{v}\in\mathbb{F^n}​v​⃗​​∈F​n​​
A⋅vn×1⃗[a11⋅⋅⋅a1n...am1⋅⋅⋅amn][v1...vn]=[∑k=1na1kvk...∑k=1namkvk]∈FmA\cdot\vec{v_{n\times 1}} \begin{bmatrix} a_{11}\cdot\cdot\cdot a_{1n}\\ .\\ .\\ .\\ a_{m1}\cdot\cdot\cdot a_{mn} \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} v_1 \\ .\\ .\\ .\\ v_n \end{bmatrix}= \begin{bmatrix} \sum_{k=1}^n a_{1k}v_k\\ .\\ .\\ .\\ \sum_{k=1}^n a_{mk}v_k \end{bmatrix}\in \mathbb{F^m}A⋅​v​n×1​​​⃗​​​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​a​11​​⋅⋅⋅a​1n​​​.​.​.​a​m1​​⋅⋅⋅a​mn​​​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​v​1​​​.​.​.​v​n​​​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​=​⎣​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎢​⎡​​​∑​k=1​n​​a​1k​​v​k​​​.​.​.​∑​k=1​n​​a​mk​​v​k​​​​​⎦​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎥​⎤​​∈F​m​​
